Create indices padded with zeros

Source: R/add_leading_symbols.R
add_leading_symbols.Rd

Create indices padded with zeros. This is important for creating appropriate for sorting names.

add_leading_symbols(file_names)

Arguments

file_names

vector of any values.

Value

A string with numbers padded with leadinng zero.

Examples

add_leading_symbols(1:200)
#>   [1] "001" "002" "003" "004" "005" "006" "007" "008" "009" "010" "011" "012"
#>  [13] "013" "014" "015" "016" "017" "018" "019" "020" "021" "022" "023" "024"
#>  [25] "025" "026" "027" "028" "029" "030" "031" "032" "033" "034" "035" "036"
#>  [37] "037" "038" "039" "040" "041" "042" "043" "044" "045" "046" "047" "048"
#>  [49] "049" "050" "051" "052" "053" "054" "055" "056" "057" "058" "059" "060"
#>  [61] "061" "062" "063" "064" "065" "066" "067" "068" "069" "070" "071" "072"
#>  [73] "073" "074" "075" "076" "077" "078" "079" "080" "081" "082" "083" "084"
#>  [85] "085" "086" "087" "088" "089" "090" "091" "092" "093" "094" "095" "096"
#>  [97] "097" "098" "099" "100" "101" "102" "103" "104" "105" "106" "107" "108"
#> [109] "109" "110" "111" "112" "113" "114" "115" "116" "117" "118" "119" "120"
#> [121] "121" "122" "123" "124" "125" "126" "127" "128" "129" "130" "131" "132"
#> [133] "133" "134" "135" "136" "137" "138" "139" "140" "141" "142" "143" "144"
#> [145] "145" "146" "147" "148" "149" "150" "151" "152" "153" "154" "155" "156"
#> [157] "157" "158" "159" "160" "161" "162" "163" "164" "165" "166" "167" "168"
#> [169] "169" "170" "171" "172" "173" "174" "175" "176" "177" "178" "179" "180"
#> [181] "181" "182" "183" "184" "185" "186" "187" "188" "189" "190" "191" "192"
#> [193] "193" "194" "195" "196" "197" "198" "199" "200"
